item.title: DEFCON China BETA 2018
item.description: Time 12 May (Sat) 13 May (Sun) 1000 Village Exhibits Machine Learning as a Tool for Societal Exploitation: A Summary on the Current and Future State of Affairs - F1F1cin 1100 StuxNNet: Practical Live Memory Attacks on Machine Learning Systems - Raphael Norwitz Scrutinizing the Weakness and Strength of AI Systems - Dr Xinyu Xing, Dr Jimmy Su, Wenbo Guo 1200 Machine learning model hardening for fun and profit - Ariel Herbert-Voss StuxNNet: Practical Live Memory Attacks on Machine Learning Systems - Raphael Norwitz 1300 AI vs AI: Undercover the Billions of Black Market in e-Commerce - Dr Bin Zhao, Jin Yang Facilitating Postmortem Program Analysis with Deep Learning - Dr Xinyu Xing, Dr Jimmy Su, Wenbo Guo 1400 WORKSHOP: Pwning Machine Learning Systems - Clarence Chio Closing 1700 Village Exhibits - Abstracts StuxNNet: Practical Live Memory Attacks on Machine Learning Systems slides, video 1, video 2
